title: Alterations and repairs
fullText:
Alterations and repairs to electrical installations in existing recreational vehicles or non-recreational vehicles shall be in accordance with Clause 1.5 of this Standard.
In New Zealand, attention is drawn to the risks outlined in Clause 1.5.1 of alterations to older recreational vehicles or non-recreational vehicles, particularly the removal of neutral-earth links, which may create an unsafe outcome, as well as to the specific requirements of Clause 6.3 for inspection and testing after alterations are carried out.
